item.title: physics739
item.description: Lecture on Advanced Topics in Photonics (E/A) - physics739 Course Lecture on Advanced Topics in Photonics (E/A) Course No. physics739 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 2+1 4 WT/ST Requirements: Preparation: Optics Form of Testing and Examination: Requirements for the examination (written or oral): successful work within the exercises Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: The goal of the course is to introduce the students to a special field of research in photonics.
